title: Tray, 1813
markings: Printed on underside with mark of Sevres factory , painted script initials "C L" and "12 M..."  Inscribed in body "JL" and "Le+."
provenance: Gift of Katrina H. Becker in memory of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Charles V. Hickox; Collection of Mr. and Mrs. Charles V. Hickox, Charleston, South Carolina
creditline: Gift of Katrina H. Becker in memory of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Charles V. Hickox
description: Oval tray with raised and everted rim.  Decorated with outer border of interlaced triangular geometric motifs in lapis bue against brown background, surrounded by thin gold rims; then a border of tooled gilding with 16 roundels painted in polychrome of exotic birds, alternating with the smaller roundels with butterflies.  Around central oval a wide band of trompe-l'oeil coffering.  Center painted with arrangement of seashells,coral, and pearls against a faux marble background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tray, 1813.
1813. Porcelain, enamel, gold. Gift of Katrina H. Becker in memory of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Charles V. Hickox. 1981-38-1.
